content: I really like this app, but today it somehow deleted all of my routines except my daily routine. I didn't hold the routine names down to delete them. They just disappeared by themselves.
replyContent: Sorry to hear that. Could you please contact us directly so we can help you troubleshooting this issue? Our email is support@dotnetideas.com. Thanks.

content: The app is excellent in every way, but I'd like to be able to watch my chores grouped by location only (in case, for example, today I'd rather work on one room of the house, to know everything that is pending or can be done in advance or can be assigned to someone else), and better if then I can sort them by date or alphabetically.
Stopped Working, Can Not Reinstall App stopped working. Uninstalled. Tried to reinstall it asks to free up space on my phone. Plenty of space... Whats the deal.
replyContent: Sorry for the late reply. There might be some issues loading the data. Do you have any special characters in your list? Please contact us directly so we can help you troubleshoot the issue. Thanks.

content: Long time user. Paid and on PC. Was going to make my own app like this, but this has everything I needed.

Unable to share list without buying additional content. Coordinating with family in a single place was our goal and it wasn't clear from the app page that you needed to buy a cloud addition and the version you initially purchase is not the full version - you have to buy and install that as well.
replyContent:
Thank you for your feedback. The reason we have separate cloud connector for syncing is to provide flexible purchase options. Not everybody needs this feature. We also try to keep our apps at reasonable price. 
If you are not happy with our apps, we can always give you full refund within one year from the date of purchase.

content: Very good app automatically gives you the chore that needs to be done on that particular day of the week. This app is like no other app in the market place, planning my different chore on different days. Very nice :)
So far so good. I really like this app and the customer service I received for my teething problems at the start (due to my own lack of knowledge) has be awesome, very prompt and very helpful üëç

I have loved this app for years but suddenly today ALL of my items except the daily list are COMPLETELY ERASED and I don't know how that happened or how to recover all that information. I will be switching permanently to using Google Calendar while I spend hours trying to remember all the data I lost.
replyContent: Sorry to hear that. Could you please contact us directly at support@dotnetideas.com so we can help you resolve the issue? Thanks.

content: This app really helps me, I have Aspergers and Anxiety so alot of everyday things can be extremely overwhelming, I have issues with memory and I need set routines to help managing everything. Thos App is brilliant with that and has had a massive impact on other areas of my life. THANKYOU
I like the concept but I keep losing my list for no apparent reason. I have rentered the data several times but it keeps dropping out. I purchased the premium app and regret that now.
replyContent: Sorry to hear that. Did you enter any special characters? Please contact us directly at support@dotnetideas.com so we can help you resolve the issue. We will always give you full refund if you are not happy with the purchase. Thanks.

content: Its vry good but one important option missing that is ..plz give the option to repeat a routine at every__hours. please
I was unable to sync even after purchasing the cloud connector .. after putting a feedback, the support team reached out and helped me fix the issue.. thank you for your prompt response.
replyContent: Are you getting any error? Have you registered? You can register an account either in app or online at www.dotnetideas.com. Please email us directly at support@dotnetideas.com so we can help you resolve the issue. Thanks.

content: I love this app but even when I upload most days I lose reminders so have to reinstall.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. You shouldn't have to reinstall to get the reminders back. Please contact us directly so we can help you resolve the issue.

content: Bought this a long time ago. A lot functionality, unfortunately widgets are quite ugly and it is necessary to tap a sync icon each time an item is changed via widget + it is not possible to choose completion date via widget, which disrupts the automated scheduling :(

I used to love the Lite version of this app, but I downloaded the full version so I can get Cloud Storage, not realizing that you need to spend MORE money for the cloud storage. I really see no difference between this version and the free version other than this version keeps sending me random chore notifications even though they don't have the notifications turned on, and my routines keep randomly disappearing one by one. I am highly disappointed.
replyContent:
Thank you for reporting the notification issue. It has been resolved. Please get the latest version(v3.3.5) from Google Play. 
The reason we have separate cloud connector for syncing is to provide flexible purchase options. If you are not happy with the purchase, we will give you full refund within one year from the date of purchase.

content: This app is my go-to-app when it comes to setting up cleaning schedules, DIY projects, gardening planners...the sky is the limit. Have been using it for I don't know how long and it keeps getting better. Need a break from all the schedules & planners; just turn on the vacation mode. If you haven't guessed it by now: I think this app is absolutely fabulous!

Spent ages writing my chore lists. Realised my device was short on space so to transfer all over to another device I happily paid for the full version and cloud connector. After I had set up and synced the list to the second device I went to uninstall from the first one and it uninstalled from the second device also. I reinstalled the the app and connector again on the second device and logged in, but sadly the list is gone :( All that time spent wasted. So I uninstalled it all again. After first uninstall a refund was given (when I didn't want one, just remove apps from device), second time no refund. Not impressed.
replyContent: Sorry to hear this. Uninstalling on one device shouldn't affect the installation on other devices. But if you refunded your purchase, that would uninstall from all your devices. Since you already synced your data to the cloud, you should be able to download it again to your device. Please contact us directly so we can help you resolve the issue.

content: Great. Tyvm.
Not syncing when closing app anymore.

I love this app. It's exactly what I was expecting and wanted. Extremely 
useful. I love that it starts out with suggestions too.
This is the best Checklist App I have found.  More features than any other app.  I wish it had better automatic backup capabilities, but I can't complains, because otherwise it is awesome!

The Cloud Connector didn't work correctly so I returned it right away. There is a bug with creating lists on the CC and in the App, where if you create a list but do not immediately create a routine, then, the list does not save.  Aside from the small bug I found the app useful enough that I paid for the full version. The options allow to me to set the reoccurences the way I want them. Despite the simplicity of these apps, I could not find the options I wanted for setting up my lists. Good batch options and the ability to set the reoccurence by either start or completion date. Thanks a bunch to the developers for this app, it's exactly what I needed!

This app is great! However I don't know if you can share it over multiple devices? For example if my partner also downloaded the app could he see and edit the same list as me? It would also be a great addition if you could assign colours to certain tasks, for example if you could share the app across multiple devices you could make one persons chores blue and the other red (for example) stickers, names and symbols would have a similar effect. Otherwise great app, 5 stars if a couple of these things could be incorporated!
replyContent: Yes, you can sync/share chores between users and devices when you purchase the Chore Checklist Cloud Connector. This app also allow you to create multiple lists and assign color for each list. You can create one list for each person. Please feel free to contact us directly if you want to know more detail about these features.

content: What happened to the color coded lists? I found it helpful to use different colors for different people in my household, but that doesn't seem to be an option anymore.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. To assign color for a list, go to the "Due Date View". Click on "Menu"->"Choose List". It will open the "Choose List" view. Then long press the name of a list, click on "Assign Color" from the popup menu.

content: Not sure why a paid app needs to run an ad network in the background. Other than that app does what it says. Nothing more, nothing less.
replyContent: Network access is removed in current version. Thank you.

content: Hasn't given one reminder. When it should be giving a reminder, I only get the message that the app has crashed.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. This issue has been fixed.

content: Tried the free version for a while, but eventually bought the full version with the cloud connector.   Use very often and well worth the $$.  In my opinion, better to use than other chores lists on the market.
Love it!

Edited version:  After I posted my initial review,  the developer contacted me straight away, we emailed back and forth, and they were super helpful! And voila - shortly after, the problems I had had with the app were fixed!! Thank you!! Love the app and it's features!!   Initial review:  This is what I've been looking for, I love the idea of how this app is build, but it won't let me add new chores to a list so something doesn't work in it. It has an option to create new chores but when I create them and save them, they never show up in the list. If this was doable I'd give it five stars.
replyContent: You definitely can add new chores. Please contact us directly so we can help you. There are also FAQs, user guides and video tutorials on our web site at www.dotnetideas.com

content: Great apps. Tq
Love it!

Once you dig into the capabilities of this app, you can do anything that you need. You can create repeating chores, one time chores, multiple lists, you name it. I have been looking for an app like this for years.

I've used this app before and it was wonderful, but it's definitely broken now. When I try to add a new routine, it deletes everything except that routine. When I try to add a chore to the routines, it does...nothing. The only thing that seems to be working are adding them as one time chores. If I do that and switch from list view to routine view (or whatever the names are), I can change it to add it to a routine. This is garbage right now. Please fix it.
replyContent: This app saves data to external storage. Are you having problem with your storage? Please contact us directly so we can help you solve the issue. Thanks.

content: I just got the app today to help in developing a set schedule for chores I can do in order to show my occupational  therapist . I have to say it is very straightforward  and seems very easy to do. If it continues to be this way I will return to up star rating. May I suggest this might be geared towards disabled people in order to help us all to get a form of our normal life back. Just a thought.
Would give this five stars if I could install it on my laptop and sync with my phone and tablet. I have it on my phone and tablet, but I like to edit on my laptop, which I cannot do with this app.
I needed something with this ability to make long lists with checkmarks and tracking. It has made a huge difference in how well organized I am, and how clean my home is. Nice.
Powerful, intuitive, flexible, simply a joy to use (Which is helpful when planning housework!)
Thank you!

Lots of good features, but they are often lost in a cluttered interface. Wording for the labels is unclear. Maybe hide (and organize) the more advanced settings for people who want them. Write an organized, easy to read help file without clumsy English and typos. This would then be a seriously good product.
replyContent: Thanks again for your feedback. There are HTML format issues in the help file which made it hard to read. We will fix it in next release. You can also find user guide online at http://blog.dotnetideas.com/page/User-Guide. Please feel free to contact us directly if you have any question. Thanks.

content: Wish you could change the order of tasks once they've been put in. Only way I can see to do this now is to delete everything and enter it in exactly the order you want. Everything else is great.
replyContent: You can move chores around within a list by drag/drop. Just click on "Menu"->"Sort By..."->check "Sort Manually". The app will enter manual sorting mode and allow you to drag/drop chores/routines to desired location. When you done re-ordering, you need to un-check it to switch back to normal mode. Please check help for more info. Thank you!

content: Keeps me organized and focused

Very good and useful. Widget gets stucked in my Samsung s4 mini. If I change any item in the app I cannot refresh list anymore in the widget nor tick items off. Please fix and it will be perfect. Also would like to assign owners and see list by owner too.

Don't let the ugly icon fool you. This is a very well thought out chore  or task tracker and reminder. Spend a few minutes learning it and it can handle just about any scenario. It's also fully editable which caught me off guard with another app I was trying.
Excellent! Using it daily for about three years now!
..... I'd like to backup to external SD card.
I like it.  Does what I need.  Only downside is I can't easily rearrange task order to match the flow of my routines.  That would be a nice feature.

My hubby and I purchased the full version and sync our chores and shopping lists. I appreciate being able to hide completed chores to make shopping easier - see what I need at a glance, show the completed items when at home and looking through my list. One request - it would be very helpful if the chore swiped away to mark as complete / hidden instead of an instant tap and it's disappeared. Would help when you tap something by accident but couldn't see it in time.   Great app, thank you!
I can no longer save. My new phone is a Oneplus which has a lot of internal memory but no SD card. Is that why I can't save?
I've had this for a long time and still love it! Thanks for the update :)
I use this app everyday. Daily chores, weekly chores, monthly chores. I absolutely live by this app!

I've used this for a few weeks and this is a fantastic app. It has everything I need. My only issue it's the widget. At least once a day it will not let me check that a chore is done. Most of the time if I press it enough it will finally check but not today.

I have been waiting and waiting for the developers to allow for "nth" day of the month scheduling. And it's here at last! This app is definitely worth paying for, even without this feature, but this is what put me into 5 stars!
Nexus 5x - list displays date due and calendar icon next to each task that is preexisting, but when I go to add a new task, it displays random "oooooooooooooo"s.
replyContent: Those "oooooooooooooo"s are last 30 days of completion statistics for daily chores. You can turn it off by clicking the graph icon on the left of the "+" icon on the daily routine. Please contact us directly so you can get help quicker. Thanks.

content: Been using this app a while now and I love it. Keeps me organised and helps me remember when I last did stuff.    Could a 'bi-monthly' and 'yearly' task list be added please?  Would be really helpful to use for my insurance renewals too. :-D
replyContent: You can all such routines by clicking on "Menu"-"New Routine" in Routine View. Then set the frequency to every 2 months or every year. Please contact us directly if you have more questions. Thank you.

content: Crashes fixed, don't know if the restore is fixed since last time I tried it
replyContent: Please contact us directly so we can help you resolve the issue. Thanks.

content: Used lite app and enjoyed it. Purchased this version to be able to use the "day pattern" shown on pictures in the app description. Unable to find this feature anywhere.
replyContent: It is available for chores on Daily Routine. Add a routine with frequency set to 1 day. Then add chore to that routine. You will see the day pattern in the chore detail view. Please contact us directly so you can get help quicker.

content: I lost my favorite list being used by me for a year, while Sync operation. The List started to show content of other existing list... And it disappeared completely from the Web. Do you have backup of my data?? I need it back!
Like the date with time stamp when task is completed
Great checklist app. Lots of customization options. Speedy customer support. Good job dev!

I feel the developers really tried to make this well thought out. It has an okay feel to it.  A high five for that! However,  my issue with it,  is the lack of an hourly or timed chore function. That's mainly what I was looking for.  I could use a memo pad and set notifications, for similar chore help.  Also,  the ability to move chores around to create a next is...type of function.  If they work on that,  I would be very likely try this app again.  Keep working on it.   =)
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. You can move chores around by click on "Menu"->"Sort by..."->"Sort Manually". If you do that a lot, there is an option in "Settings". You can turn it on permanently.

content: Great

I've had this app for over a year. It worked great until a month ago. Whenever I try to add new chores or amend existing ones, error populates stating "Fail to save data. Please try again." Please fix this!!
replyContent: This bug should be fixed in current version(3.0.4). Are you still having issue adding new chores? Please contact us directly so we can help resolve the issue. Thank you!

content: Can I set up chores for different children ?
replyContent: Yes, this app allows you to create multiple lists. You can create one list for each child. If you all have the full version and cloud connector, the kids can download and sync their lists. You can then review them. Please go to www.dotnetideas.com for more information.

content: Loved this app, but can't amend anything since update, no use to me now. All fixed now and great again, use this app to schedule my exercise as well as chores.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. This bug is fixed. Please get the latest version 3.0.4 from Google Play Store.

content: This app is simple but I am able to some how mess it up. I go from 5 stars to 1 star and every time it was something I did wrong then I go back to 5 stars. The devs always respond quickly but I haven't needed any help from them because eventually I figure out that there is nothing wrong with this app but there sure is something wrong with the person using the app ME. GOT IT NOW. Great app thank you. You won't be getting anymore negative ratings from me. 5 stars period.
replyContent: Please contact us directly(support@dotnetideas.com) so we can help you resolve the issue. Thank you. DotNetIdeas

content: I want a refund
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Please contact us directly so we can give you refund.

content: I love this app.  It helps me run my life smoothly.  I love the way it can be weekly monthly daily quarterly and more.  Tech support were fantastic when I had a prob caused by my tablet.  Worth every penny.

Wife and I bought this app for the sole purpose of creating a shared checklist. Reluctantly paid the extra $1.99 for cloud sharing, only to find that the sharing mechanism is an unintuitive mess; we immediately got error messages when downloading each other's lists, and several days later have still had no luck. A total disappointment.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Please contact us directly so we can help you resolve this issue. We can also give you full refund if you don't want it anymore.

content: It is practical & simple. Allows you to breakdown over time, loads of work  in manageable chunks. The work becomes fun, instead of a dread.  Highly recommend it. The widget is great! I only have a problem with the reset time. It keeps resetting at midnight.
replyContent: Could you please contact us directly so we can help you with these issues? Thanks.

content: This didn't have a complete list. Not worth a dime!
replyContent: You can customize the pre-loaded list or get more comprehensive lists from our list catalog online at www.dotnetideas.com. If you want refund, please contact us directly. We give full refund at any time with no questions asked. Thanks!

content: I love this app!  It definitely helps me keep my chores organized.  My only gripe is that I can't seem to figure out how to change the colour of the checkmarks (once I complete a task). They are a horribly ugly neon green that clashes with everything.

I like using this app to keep me on track but every week or 2 I have to replace the widget because it stops responding. Granted the paid version has this issue a whole lot less than the free version. I like it a lot I just wish the widget worked more often. I have had a few times that the app itself quit responding to me checking off tasks but restarting my phone seemed to work when that happened.

I tried out the free version first and then purchased the $1.50 version of the app. I deleted the free version and when I try to use the sync, it tells me "This version is not enabled for your current version." Says the "Sync List" is only available in the full version. I have the app that says "Chore Checklist Full". Is there something I'm missing? **EDIT** Never mind, I see now it says you have to purchase the "Cloudconnector" as well for more features, so that is another $1.99 you have to spend. So I wasted $1.50 for nothing I guess. I don't appreciate being mislead to believe I am buying a "full" version when you are not actually getting a full version at all. You shouldn't have to buy a second app to get a "full" version app to work.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. The reason we have separate cloud connector for syncing is to provide flexible purchase options. Not everybody needs this feature. We also try to keep our apps at reasonable price. The cloud connector is one time purchase but it provides unlimited sync. We can give you refund of the full version if you would like.

content: It would be better if I could select certain days to do tasks rather than every 2 or more days. Example is do chore on Tuesday Thursday and saturday.
replyContent: In this case, you can use the combination of "Daily Routine" and "Day pattern". When you add a chore to a daily routine, you can select which day of the week you want to do the chore. You would select Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday in your example. Please contact us directly if you have more questions. Thanks.

content: I recently decided to take on a caregiver position for my parents. I purchased the FULL app and Cloud Connector and it works great. I can run and send reports to my siblings keeping them up to date and they can see I'm accountable for my work.  I had used the LITE version for years. I love checking things off and the due date for when an item needs to come back around is automatically set. An item comes back around and it reminds me. I enjoy writing out checklists but it was inefficient writing the same routines down over AND over. this app is awesome!!! SO worth the few bucks for a EXTRA FULL version but the LITE version is simply great too :)

I have contacted the developers multiple times relating to minor bugs and they have contacted me within a few hours to a day with either information on how I can do what I am trying to do (when the 'bug' was user error) or asking for more details so they can fix the bug. An update to the app with the fix was sent out within one week from when I first contacted the developers. Great app too! I have been better able to organize the chores that need done and keep on task. Great app and professional support!

I use this for more than just chores, it is my total to-do list. I like that I can create my own categories or "locations", but I WISH there was a view where I could sort by location (then I could see all my errands or anything that needs to be done in the kitchen in one place). I appreciate that I can choose a different sound for each notification, I wish I could do like the app "task list" can do and choose a different icon to appear in the notification bar with it, rather than always being the broom logo

I refuse to pay for an incomplete "full" version. Why buy an app that later tells you that the very function you purchased it for is not available in the so-called "full" version?? And to top it off, the developers refused to refund the purchase cost.
replyContent: Our record shows that you asked for refund on 8/9/2014 and we refunded it on the same day. If you had trouble receiving the refund, please contact us directly. Thank you.

content: Absolutely perfect! I am so much more productive thanks to this app!
replyContent: Could you please provide more detail? Please contact us directly by send email to support@dotnetideas.com so we can work with you on resolving the issue. Thank you!

content: I buy full, install full and uninstall the lite version. It even says full version in the top. But when I want to sync it says no and claims that I am still on the lite version
replyContent: Did you buy the cloud connector? The full version removes Ads, add reports and other features. But to be able to sync, you also need to purchase the cloud connector. Thank you!

content: I am becoming extremely frustrated with this app!! I have purchased the full version and the cloud connector but still cannot sync my lists with the web version!
replyContent: Are you still having issue with syncing? Please contact us directly so we can help you. Thank you!

content: pLZ help me..I just got the full an it still shows stuff as if I had the lite one when I review my list. an when I changed the colors it don't show all what I put in.. I even backed up my list before I got the full. Really don't want to make new list if its not goin to change anything I would like to have everything in the full that I paid for PLZ help me out I really do like this app wouldn't want to take off thanks..
replyContent: We are not sure we understand what the issue is. Please contact us directly by send email to support@dotnetideas.com so we can help you. Thank you!

content: If you could add a "streak" counter (and a widget for it would be awesome)... I would be able to get rid of an app that does just that (Habit streak pro).  Motivational! Add a daily percentage score and my world is perfect (bye bye Daily Sucess) and I would pay pay pay for these features

So far so good-need I say more?I recommend this for anyone looking for a tasks/chore App that not only costs less but does more than the most pricey ones-kudos guys and let's have more updates cos there's more room for improvements!
I love this app, but I can't figure out how to sync it to my husband's phone as well..
replyContent: Please contact us directly so we can help you. Our email is support@dotnetideas.com. You can also find user guide, FAQs and video tutorial online at www.dotnetideas.com. Thank you.

content: Have a Samsung galaxy S5 phones, tab 4.0 for kids, and a Tab S for adults to share. Initially had some CTD error but it resolved itself. Took an hour and a half to setup chores for a household of 7 but using the cloudconnect I can check and add chores from anywhere. Worth every penny!!
Works really well for me
I've synced the specific lists to each child's phone. My hubby and I work, and this provides reminder, tracking, syncing and reports for my tweens to follow. Excellent!

I've only had it for a couple of weeks now but I seriously love this app.  Really keeps me on track.  I love the flexibility that it has to sort manually and especially with the new daily pattern.  That was a much needed and much appreciated update.  Thanks for helping me keep my life in line.  Keep up the good work guys!
Having same problem as the reviewer below me,  widget no longer responsive.  Can't tick items of home screen.  Resetting the widget only solves problem temporarily
replyContent:
Please email us directly so we can troubleshoot the issue. 
Thanks,
DotNetIdeas

content: I love the app. I can add all chores exactly the way I want. The overview is excellent. The widget makes it easy to check of chores. Unfortunately the latest release has made the widget problem worse. The widget will not only become unresponsive: now it doesn't sync anymore. I can check off chores in the app but it will still show chores as undone in the widget. Removing the list from the widget or removing the widget and adding it again will help but only for a little while...
replyContent:
Thank you for your review. Please contact us directly so we can troubleshoot the issue.
DotNetIdeas

content: Thanks for the great app. I'm trying to figure out how to edit and add to the locations i can set my chores at on my Samsung Note 4. Pls enlighten me how to go about doing it
replyContent: To edit location, open "Routine View" and click on "Menu"->"Settings..."->"Edit Locations"

content: The app is really great. Been using it for years. A few months ago, it wouldn't load my list that I'd meticulously created over the years and I had to start over and build a new one. So I bought the sync module and set up auto-syncing. Now, all of the sudden after syncing it loads some random list that I never made, and my list seems to be gone. Sadly, I no longer trust this app with my data and will look for a (I'm sure less functional) alternative.
replyContent:
Sorry to hear that. Would you please email us directly so we can try to resolve the issue? Maybe we can help you to recover your list.
Thanks, DotNetIdeas

content: Update: Wow, do i feel dumb! All i had to do was move the app back to the phone's storage. Thanks for letting me know - back to 5 stars :-) The widget was working fine until I had to restart my phone. Now I don't have the option to put it back on my screen. Same thing on my tablet. Help! I miss seeing my list without having to open the app. Other than that, this is the best one I've ever come across.
replyContent: Please check if the app is moved to "SD card". If so, please move it back to "Phone". The app needs to be installed on device(not SD card) in order to display widget. If that is not the case. Try uninstall and re-install the app.

content: It is really great but I need to use the snooze option and choose the time for snoozing like 5 minutes or more. Hope you will add this option to later updates.And btw, I use this App for my business appointments too, so, I suggest using a better icon than home cleaning tools for the app. it has much wider use than home cleaning tasks
I strongly recommend this. Its easy to customize and works great tracking your routine activities.

Installed the full version tonight and so far I have no complaints, which is saying a lot! I expect a lot from apps that I pay for (even a small payment), and this one has delivered in-full. Multiple views, very detailed. Easy to edit, rearrange, and sort. Love it all! - From a organization geek.

This is my favorite and most useful app. Very beneficial for keeping organized in not only chores but in addition I keep track of my appointments, etc. Developer is extremely helpful with answering any questions about the app and ways of making the app even better. I would highly recommend this app.

I used to use the lite version but upgraded to the full version and can't see my chores in the due date view,  which I prefer.  Would give 5 stars if this can be done. Please tell me how,  I have tried changing settings and can't figure it out.
replyContent: Did you choose a list when opening the due date view? There is also an option "Show in widget" on each routine. It needs to be enabled in order for the routine to show up in due date view. Please contact us directly so we can help you to resolve the issue.Our email is support@dotnetideas.com. Thanks.

content: I've tried tons of chore lists etc.  Always return to paper and pen where I have a clear picture of what has been done.  Add the widget!  It's clear,  easy to set up with times,  allows skipping or showing when you completed (even if on a different day then you had hoped). Love it
Excellent app. Would be great if there is a feature using which we can add routines based on weekdays. For example, dusting on Monday & Friday.

I LOVE this app.                                      The only thing I wish it coyld do it that I could use it with my family so my kids could have their chores on their phone too and their chore would sync on my phone when they do them.
replyContent:
Thank you for the suggestion. We will consider it in future release. 
Please contact us regarding the slowness issue.
The reason we have separate cloud connector for syncing is to provide flexible purchase options. Not everybody needs this feature.

content: Needs time along with date. Export to .csv. share functions.  Backup functions. If routine date is st for (1) day, not able to set next due date for highet date than present date.

This app has great features and has really helped remind me of the things I need to get done. The developer is fantastic! Any time I've had an issue they responded VERY quickly and resolved it. I highly recommend this app!!!
Support team reply promptly to my questions!! Apps itself is also great. Thanks!!
Development have worked really closely with me to get it working again.  Thanks very much.
I use this for everything.  I wish I new how to change the default "list" though.

Wonderful. Keeps me on track for cleaning. Love the easy customization options. Notes r used to include cleaning hints & products to use. I expanded the basic chore list then added a "zone" checklist to include in-depth cleaning instructions. Outstanding app and support. Thanks again.

I love this app and it works really well with a method I've used for a few years now from the book Sidetracked Home Executives. The developer responds quickly to my questions. It's inexpensive both for this app and the accompanying app for cloud backup and easy chore entry. So far the only thing missing is the ability to have a monthly chore (or yearly) land on a specific day of the week- on my cleaning days. This will come, I have no doubt.

This app is the best!  I use it constantly,  and it really helps keep me on track with what needs to be done and when I did it last.  If you're a bit disorganized like me, you need this app!  Everyone who does FlyLady should take a look--you can have a "shine sink" reminder.  It's very customizable with what tasks you want to accomplish and how frequently, and you can set reminder sounds or just look at the list.  Plus the developers respond quickly to questions or suggestions.  Highly recommended!!!
Extremely responsive developer. Supports multiple lists. Highly customizable. Perfect for all my needs. Updated regularly.

This app is more than just a chore checklist. You can manage any type of routine in this app.  Personal, car maintenance, workout ...anything!  The features make it so much easier to set up and manage your routines than any other checklist app.
Love everything about it!  Keeps track of my chores shows me when I did them last and keeps me on track!
Keeps me on track with my chores. I like the option to color code the background and text for overdue chores and the ones I have procrastinated  :)

My wife and I have a crazy work schedule, working nights and swing shift kind of stuff, and the teenagers didn't know what to do to help around the house. This app fixed our problem when no other solutions did. The sync, and list sharing help us maintain the list, but there is one main tablet mounted on a wall in our kitchen the kids use to keep the list updated. That way if the cloud sync is down for a day, it doesn't hinder any routine This single app has honestly significantly improved our family's life!
Love it, and support seems to be very good :)
Took the time to set it up to my own custom chores, and added the cloud add-on. Its exactly what i needed, and it works flawlessly.
This app crashes on my phone, only able to make 4 lists, wth? Downloading lists deletes existing lists. Wasting precious time! So disappointed!!!
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. There is no limit on how many lists you can make. When you download list, it overwrite local list. If you want to merge the lists between your device and server, you need to use "Sync/Upload List". Please contact us directly so we can help you. We also have detailed user guide in app and online at www.dotnetideas.com

content: As a full time freelance writer it's common for me to be working on multiple jobs at a time, all while keeping my blog and website updated, networking with clients, and trying to fit an actual life in the middle of it all. This app keeps me organized and focused. I have a few different lists that I use regularly, as well as one that acts as a catchall for things I'd like to do in the future.  I feel so much more organized and I love how great it is to have everything on my phone. Thanks!
Only see

Totally Awesome!!!  Easy to use. It gives u list of basics u can follow or u can totally customize ur list & each task; change, delete,  add. Plus u totally customize every color for highlighting stuff. Has daily,  weekly, monthly,  etc. Fantastic.  Plus u can set reminder alarms. Also can make as a widge so it's hard to ignore ur chores if u've got to look at em!!!  Luv it luv it luv it!!!! MUST HAVE APP!!!

I am a stay-at-home mom of three kids aged 3 and under. This app helps me keep my sanity! I have a small list of household chores I have to get done each day and this program helps me stay organized and on top of things. I have used the free version for months and decided it was time to pay for the full version to support the work. I was resigned to having to input each task again since I didn't need the cloud connector. Was happy to find the app automatically imported the lists from the free version :)
Excellent. Developer is responsive. It was a little hard for me to get used to the concept of "routines" but now that I've been using it for several months, I see advantages.
Agreeing with others About the delay in the app... frustrating. Also need to be able to group locations, so can get stuff done In one room. It is a brilliant app though,just needs tweaking.

Update- Email contact was finally made. Sync and web page problem was corrected. But now a little wary. Will update again if no more problems occur.  Bought this app and the Cloud Connect a couple of weeks.  Now cannot get to the web page, syncing does not work, and DOTNETIDEAS is not responding to email.  Starting to think they skipped out.
Lost without it...
Love the way you can sync from phone to server to tablet and back to my phone. Has to be done in app view but the upload/download option is huge help!	Love this app. Helps me stay organized.

I had the lite version of this app and it was awesome other than the fact that if you rebooted your phone all the lists would be gone. So I paid for this version where you could update and save your lists online. For ex I know I added vacuuming under one of my routines online and after syncing it I couldn't find it on my phone. But if you sync your phone to the server online, it deleted all the progress you made that week. And this happened several times. They need an auto update after everytime I check off
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Please contact us directly if you are having issue with the app.

content: I love that this app has auotmatically recurring chores. I have not been able to find another with this feature. The low rating is for the notifications. The daily routine notifications worked perfectly for about 2 weeks then maybe, maybe not, and then not at all, even when I have the app open. This makes it useless for me for daily routines which is the main reason I bought it. Have to switch back to a clunky manual app that is reliable with this. :-(
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Please contact us directly and we will be happy to help you to resolve this issue.

content: I would have given it 5  stars, but I have to purchase another app in order to sync between devices, which is a bit of a scam.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. The reason we have separate cloud connector for syncing is to provide flexible purchase options. Not everybody needs this feature.

content: Easy to enter chores, but there is no way to sort by location.  It would be so much better to see all the chores for the day sorted by the room...rather than have to search the list to see if everything I need do to in the kitchen has been done before I move on to other areas of the house.

If this app had a website you could log into to organize your lists like 'out of milk' does, it would be amazing. Changing entry's notification sounds/times/task names is tedious, and you kind of have to change bi-weekly and monthly tasks as they appear instead of being able to do it all at once. Can you please provide a website we can log on to to make changes to lists? Then it would be 5 stars for sure.

Good app, does exactly as described, its a bit fiddly to set up but once you have a regular routines in then its fine. The widget however is useless, the static text is tiny and against an semi_opaque background that's unreadable.
replyContent: The text size, text color and background colors of list and widget are configurable in app's settings. Click on "Menu"->"More"->"Settings..."->"Settings" to set those settings.

content: After fiddling with the free version for a while & comparing it to others of the same type, I was so impressed that I bought the full version. I spent about an hour getting the routines & chores I wanted set up, then I hit 'Sync', and got the message that the feature was not available on the version I have. This app will get a 5 star rating from me when this is resolved.
Looks great in theory. I bought this so I can set up routines  for my kids to check off, and the app won't even open. Wasted my money. Motorola Droid M.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Please contact us directly and we will be happy to help you to resolve this issue.

content: This app is ok. I am glad it has a reminder time on it.
Works well, very helpful for a person who has no memory. A scrolling widget would be 5 star worthy. :D

Been looking for a way to keep track of my to-do list for a while but all the planners and calenders make you set a time of day which is not what I wanted at all. The Chore Checklist lets me put in all my stuff, with specific dates, but no time appointment necessary. LOVE it so far! Only wish is that there was a way to view a full calender, would be great to have a visual when selecting days for "next due date" :) So happy to have found this widget! 5 stars!

Would love to be able to set some routines as sequential. Eg. I can't tumble dry my laundry until I have washed it, so it would be great if 'tumble dry laundry' was hidden until I had done the previous task in the routine, 'wash laundry'. Would give 5 stars for that.

I have been using this app for a long time. It is great! Especially since I'm very forgetful but have a full schedule I want to stick to. I would have given 5 stars but the notification sound part does not work all the time. Ever chore has a special sound but half of them don't even go off at the time I have saved. Very frustrating. Please fix this and you will be THE BEST put there. Thanks

I have the chore list and the grocery helper from this Dev and I LOOOOOOVE them!  They're preloaded with everything you can think of!  I hardly had to add any thing!I bought the pro versions on both apps cuz I love them so much! Absolute life savers!  Thank you Devs! Oh, please add a scrollable widget  ;-)  Samsung galaxy proclaim.

I think the app itself helps a lot, but it would be amazing if the widget was actually functional..not just a semi-transparent screen with a list on it...I need to be able to check stuff off and keep going with my life...not wait around for "Widget View" to load up....
Used for 2 years and love it. Devs are incredibly helpful.
Can not live without this app. For adults with ADD, here is the answer to your prayers. A huge thank-you to the developers!

I love the concept of this app but I really want an app like this with a widget. This is the best and I have tried alot! But really want a widget and this only has widget view option which I dont understand why that is needed when your already in the app... DEVELOP A WIDGET!!
replyContent: There are 5 different sizes of widget. You need to install the app on your phone(not SD card) in order to be able to see the widgets.

content: Thanks, this is exactly what I was looking for!  The customer support is fabulous, too!

I used Astrid for many months and found it to be very irritating, and worse, I kept putting off taking care of tasks. I then found Chore Checklist...this app ROCKS! It's very user friendly, enjoyable, and now I actually get my chores done. There's something about Chore Checklist that makes me want to get things done rather than procrastinate!
There are no widgets. Just a "widget view", that is not a widget.
replyContent: There are 5 different sizes of widget. You need to install the app on your phone(not SD card) in order to be able to see the widgets.

content: a little slow.  it's  frustrating when small fast items are checked off in groups,  as it takes a bit for the checkmark to show,  and during that time another box can't be checked.  Small gripe.  Otherwise a great app for an ADHD fella like me to use to keep chaos at bay!

I use it for all the things I want to do habitually every single day.  I use in combination with Astrid for one time tasks/projects and Chore Checklist for routine repeatable tasks.  I the two app icons side-by-side on my android phone and use them constantly.  I like that you can check off the chore for today and it will automatically come back on tomorrow unchecked again.  Excellent app for those that live by checklists.

Fantastic app, works well for GTD.  The widget view is good, too, but could use multiple list option, i.e., one 2x2 window for daily tasks, one 2x2 window for longer-term FIFO tasks, one for the default chorechecklist, etc.

This is exactly what I needed. No need to write a to do list for those daily, weekly, bi-weekly, monthly routine jobs, they are right in front of you just in case you forget something. Planning your domestic chores has never been easier!
Love this app!

Tried so many other apps/tasklists. This is best for me. Easy to use organised paying bills/follow up on work/meds/chores/projects. Like reports and graphs. Love it. With icons would give 5 stars as could use with people  with reading difficulties

I would really love to be able to rearrange the tasks. At the moment I have a list of chores with stuff like 'feed dog morning' and 'feed dog evening' etc. It would be great to move the morning stuff up and evening stuff down. Otherwise, this app is superb (considering all the competition out there!)
The ability to have different routines is so useful. Really easy to use, very flexible. HTC Sensation.
I'd love to be able to create multiple lists for different family members. @Leslie - where's the problem? You can add & delete chores all you want.
What about single women with no children who want to use this?

I purchased this when I first got my Android phone, but deleted it as I found it too complex to set up.  However, just reinstalled it (5 months later) and got the hang of it just like that!  Comprehensive - yet simple to use, and has everything I need to make sure I get the things done that I need to get done!
Great product and even greater customer service!
This is exactly what I wanted. Had a million to-do lists installed before I realised I wanted a check list and then after falling in love with this I realize I can edit lists on my computer. Perfect!
Goes well no probs.

This app is really useful, and more functions are still being added. Unfortunately the widget disappears when I restart my phone, and I have to reinstall the app to get it back. It's the only problem, but even without the widget this app is still helpful.

As the changelog indicates all new functionality, which needs internet access, is actually handled by another app. So why does THIS package ask for net access now? It just became yet another app requiring unnecessary rights, that is not what I paid for.
Love it. Very helpful.
Use this everyday and love it
Excellent app. Love it!
Couldn't download,  got a refund
I absolutely love this app. Add the ability to sync with my husband's phone and I won't need anything else!
Love the app.  Any way we could get an every weekday and every weekend option on the scheduler?  Would also be handy to be able to check off multiple specific days on the weekly function.
YES!  All the options I need & easy to use!  Contacted them with a problem.  Had an answer in under an hour - user error.  Can't be happier!
I use the widget to keep my chore list always out in front of me. The developer was very responsive when I suggested new features.
Very handy. Please make it easier to check, have to be very precise. Also would like to view today/overdue including completed tasks.
Extremely helpful & customizable. Hvn't used reg but i plan to. I would love 2 c a weekly or monthly calendar view added, however. Thanku, Evo
Excellent app, great functionally

I absolutely love this app. In the month or so I've had it, the cleanliness of my home has increased by orders of magnitude. I agree with one of the above reviewers that the only thing that could make it better would be the ability to sync lists between multiple phones.
Life saver for a busy mom! Love how I can add new chores, routines and reminders. Awesome!
Just what I was looking for. Devs VERY responsive. Only needs Google task sync. Fantastic!

Simple, straightforward app with a great UI and logic behind it. Use it every day, to keep my habits productive. Chore Checklist and ThinkingRock (desktop and Android) are my one-two punch for GTD, productivity, and good habits. App is also great for simple stuff like shopping lists.
Favorite productive app
I love this app. Use it every day for just about every thing. And I love my custom widget!
Wonderful app! Easy to customize.
This app not only does a good job of keeping track of chores, but it makes you want to complete them.

I love this app. I actually have been keeping my house cleaner the past couple of days it is really helpful. I too threw away my "family binder" that had my cleaning list in it. One thing I thought would be cool was if I was able to link/ sync to other cell phones ie. my husbands (and kids if my kids were older and had cell phones) and then assign chores to different cell phones on our account. That would be a cool feature.
Just what I was looking for! Now I can throw away my cleaning binder!! :)
Fantastic, exactly what I was looking for!
Don't love cleaning, but love this! Like the pre-loaded chores, but found a different way to organize it for my purposes. Great job!
Was looking for something like this and it is great. Simple and effective.
